name: Forensic Lab Procedures
description: Lab-based techniques for processing and analyzing forensic evidence.

cards.title: Microscopic Trace Analysis
cards.description: Examining trace evidence such as fibers, hair, and gunshot residue.
bulletpoints: Use microscopes to identify fiber and hair characteristics
Analyze glass and paint fragments for source determination
Test for gunshot residue on suspects and clothing

cards.title: Forensic Toxicology & Drug Screening
cards.description: Testing biological samples for toxins, drugs, and poisons.
bulletpoints: Use GC-MS and LC-MS techniques to detect drug metabolites
Analyze blood alcohol levels and poisoning indicators
Correlate toxicology findings with cause of death analysis
